name: Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame
description:
Generates Flames of War on both sides. +1 Fighting Spirit to the Flames of War on your side. (Each Flames of War tallies the damage dealt by its side to the other as "Fighting Spirit." At the start of each Round's Action Phase, the side with more "Fighting Spirit" will clear their "Fighting Spirit," causing their currently active character to deal +1 DMG in this Round.)
(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)

storytitle: Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame
storytext: "Every participant, whether they win or lose, contributes to the defense of our nation. That's what makes it such an honor to take part."
